ygData.subject: whining
ygData.msgSnippet: No..there is a difference between *discussing* problems and offering fixes...vrs *whining* about problems, and just plain nonsense BS we keep hearing over and
ygData.messageBody:
No..there is a difference between *discussing* problems and offering
fixes...vrs *whining* about problems, and just plain nonsense BS we keep
hearing over and over again eh?

I want to hear peoples opinions just as much as you do...just that some
people don't know how to approach a discussion intelligently.

-- Lim'Dul


>Maybe if you think, you will see that if so many people wining there is
>something wrong? If we dont talk here about our problems i dont know where
>we can tak if you send mail to verant only reply is that eventualy sombody
>send your email to xxxx department. If you dont like this messages simply
dont read them i like to hear all problems whot other wizards have or think
to have.





Silverion Dragonirder
